Text: New dll Version Cc po I need to update a dll on your system so when you get a free chance get out of everything that you are in and let me know The process will take about minutes and will correct the problem with the California Imbalance showing up as ECTstCal instead of EESI Thanks Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Specialist Enron Portland
Excelpst I have several people working on coming up with a way to do this As soon as I have something I will let you know Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Specialist Enron Portland

New Portland Web Site nsf Good Morning Exciting News We now have a new Portland Web based IT incident tracking application to replace the existing Westdeskitissuesmde Access application The new Web based solution adds several key enhancements that will hopefully improve IT response time and improve our communications back to you when problems are resolved Here are some of the key enhancments Ability to query outstanding resolved issues IT problemresolution knowledge base Web page that displays important IT contact information Automatic email notifications to resolution team members And much much more For those of you who may be new to the office or may have forgotten about the old Westitissuesmde application This application is continuously monitored by the production support team for infrastructure PCs Monitors terminalserver LAN WAN etc and application Enpower Portcalc CAPS etc problems or enhancements requested by users This database is also summarized to capture metrics which are then used to evaluate the performance of the IT group Here are the steps to using the new West Desk Problem Tracking System New Login Go to Click the Login button towards the bottom of the page In the UserName Box Enter ITWD For the Password type in Password On the next Screen fill out all the information Only certain fields are required but filling out everything is preferable After Clicking the submit button you are going to be asked to login with the new username and password you created in the New User Area Upon submitting you will come to the main index page Adding a WorkOrder On the Main index page click on the link add incident to log under the heading of West Desk Links Fill out as much information as possible For IT Contact please enter appropriate contact or if you are not sure select mtully Select Priority This may be changed by IT Submit form Note For the description and response fields you may use html tags for the formatting of text for display The rest is pretty self explanatory If you hover your cursor over a link or picture or text box a texttip will appear and tell you what that link or textbox is for Thanks Mike Tully Trading Floor Support PS When entering a incident there are two different types of NEW Requests One is New Request Problem This is used for reporting an error or problem with an application The other is New Request Enhancement which is used for requesting an enhancement to an application

West Desk Support Web Site Cc Everyone in the following gorups now have access to the West Desk Support Web Site at The UserName is the same as your NT WK Login UserName And the password is the same as the username Please use this site to log problems with CAPS Excel Enpower FSP network problems or anything else that IT Needs to get involved in Those of you that have logged in under the old username Password system have also been changed to the new system The Groups are Real Time Pre Sched Volume Management Risk Middle Marketing Power Traders Thank you for your time Michael Tully Application Support

Spot Prices Web PagePST I have heard rumors that the spot prices web page has not been working correctly Do you know about this and if so what was the problem Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Work Cell Meddle not in the affairs of dragons For you are crunchy and good with mustard

Terminal ServerPST If your TERMINAL SERVER H drive is located in Houston Please let me know ASAP You will know if it is by signing on to a terminal Server session and then double clicking on My Computer and then select the H Drive If it says anything like nahou then you are located in Houston If it says napdx then you are located in Portland The only ones I need to know about is if you are located in Houston Thank you for your time Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk
Missing CDsPST If anyone has borrowed the Visual Studios CDs from the IT department could you please return them Thanks Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

RE EnpowerPST The Enpower Oracle database is back up please let me know if you have any further problems You should NOT have to get out of Enpower to continue working Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted Original Message From Tully Michael Sent Friday November AM To DLPortland World Trade Center Subject Enpower The Enpower Database is down I have been speaking to Houston and they are estimating minutes before it is back up As soon as it comes back I will let you know Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted

EnpowerPST The Enpower Database is down I have been speaking to Houston and they are estimating minutes before it is back up As soon as it comes back I will let you know Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted

Bike Commute ChallengePST For those that are interested I just got an Email from the Bicycle Transportation Alliance and due to a calculation error Team Enron did in fact take FIRST PLACE Congratulations to all who participated It was a lot of work but it finally paid off Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted

Bike Commute ChallengePST In case you are interested the results of the Bike Commute Challenge were given last night at the Bike Commute Hubbub Enron placed Second behind REI of Jantzen Beach The stats were not given but when Heather gets back I am sure that she can get this information and pass it on Thanks for everyones participation Lets take first NEXT YEAR Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted

Curve ManagerPST To all who use Curve Manager As you know we have been experiencing technical difficulties with Curve Manager on Terminal Server As of right now please use Curve Manager locally This application runs just as fast as on terminal server as it does locally Also it seems to be more stable running locally However if you DO experience difficulty running this application locally please let me know ASAP thanks Michael S Tully Application Support Portland Desk Cell There is never time to do it right but there is always time to do it over

RE Terminal Server Curve ManagerPST On term server again Michael S Tully Application Support Portland Desk Cell Original Message From Salisbury Holden Sent Tuesday August AM To Tully MIchael Subject RE Terminal Server Curve Manager FYI We seem to be having this problem again Original Message From Tully MIchael Sent Friday August PM To DLPortland World Trade Center Subject Terminal Server Curve Manager The problem reported earlier with Terminal Server and Enpowers Curve Manager have been fixed Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk
Terminal Server Curve ManagerPST The problem reported earlier with Terminal Server and Enpowers Curve Manager have been fixed Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

Curve ManagerPST This is just to let everyone who is using the New Curve Manager in Enpower The Curve Manager is having a problem in Terminal Server NAHOUTRDTS The problem is currently being diagnosed by both the Enpower Team and Terminal Server Team in Houston As Soon as it is fixed I will let everyone know For now you can use any other terminal server session ie TRDTS or TRDTS TRDTS for running the Curve Manager Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

New Portland Web Site nsf Good Morning Exciting News We now have a new Portland Web based IT incident tracking application to replace the existing Westdeskitissuesmde Access application The new Web based solution adds several key enhancements that will hopefully improve IT response time and improve our communications back to you when problems are resolved Here are some of the key enhancments Ability to query outstanding resolved issues IT problemresolution knowledge base Web page that displays important IT contact information Automatic email notifications to resolution team members And much much more For those of you who may be new to the office or may have forgotten about the old Westitissuesmde application This application is continuously monitored by the production support team for infrastructure PCs Monitors terminalserver LAN WAN etc and application Enpower Portcalc CAPS etc problems or enhancements requested by users This database is also summarized to capture metrics which are then used to evaluate the performance of the IT group Here are the steps to using the new West Desk Problem Tracking System New Login Go to Click the Login button towards the bottom of the page In the UserName Box Enter ITWD For the Password type in Password On the next Screen fill out all the information Only certain fields are required but filling out everything is preferable After Clicking the submit button you are going to be asked to login with the new username and password you created in the New User Area Upon submitting you will come to the main index page Adding a WorkOrder On the Main index page click on the link add incident to log under the heading of West Desk Links Fill out as much information as possible For IT Contact please enter appropriate contact or if you are not sure select mtully Select Priority This may be changed by IT Submit form Note For the description and response fields you may use html tags for the formatting of text for display The rest is pretty self explanatory If you hover your cursor over a link or picture or text box a texttip will appear and tell you what that link or textbox is for Thanks Mike Tully Trading Floor Support Curve ManagerBill NonPrivilegedpst To all who use Curve Manager As you know we have been experiencing technical difficulties with Curve Manager on Terminal Server As of right now please use Curve Manager locally This application runs just as fast as on terminal server as it does locally Also it seems to be more stable running locally However if you DO experience difficulty running this application locally please let me know ASAP thanks Michael S Tully Application Support Portland Desk Cell There is never time to do it right but there is always time to do it over

CAPSBill NonPrivilegedpst Some time early this afternoon the CAPS gurus in Houston need to replace the CAPS file again It will take about ten minutes but needs to get done Please let me know when would be a good time Michael S Tully Application Support Portland Desk Cell

RE CAPSBill NonPrivilegedpst Actually I just found out that he is not going to do it until this afternoon Is it better at the top of the hour Michael S Tully Application Support Portland Desk Cell Original Message From Williams III Bill Sent Tuesday August AM To Tully MIchael Subject RE CAPS How about Original Message From Tully MIchael Sent Tuesday August AM To Williams III Bill Subject CAPS TJ Butler needs to bring down CAPS for about ten minutes When would be a good time and can you make sure that all your guys are out at that time Michael S Tully Application Support Portland Desk Cell

File Restoration Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst I have already asked Paul about this but I wanted to send this as kind of a reminder David Porter from Real Time would like the following files restored from Tape Backup PRealTimeIncrementWindowsAugTradingPorterxls PReslTimeIncrementWindowsAugServicesPorterxls Thanks in advance Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

CAPS OutageBill NonPrivilegedpst The CAPS overlay was done late yesterday afternoon Therefore the CAPS outage today is no longer going to happen As a reminder Any problems please enter them into the westdesk support web page at Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

CAPS OutageBill NonPrivilegedpst Tomorrow at pm PST we need everyone to be out of CAPS so that we may overlay it This will only take about minutes I will email a followup email tomorrow at am to remind everyone again Thank you for your cooperation Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

Excel Issues Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst I believe I have asked before but in case I missed you If you or any of your traders get an error while working in excel about not being able to save please capture a screen shot and email it to me I am currently working with Microsoft to get this resolved but they have requested a screen shot of the actual error message Much Thanks Michael Tully Application Support Portland Desk

Forward obligations Cc you two send me the criteria in Forward obs that you are using and your usernamespwds for Enpower so that they can run it sidebyside in Houston and see the differences Thanks Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted

FW TJ Butler on vacation next weekFYIanyone that deals with CAPS please read the message below You can reach me after hours via cell phone Michael S Tully Trade Floor Support Portland Desk Cell He who runs behind car often get exhausted Original Message From Butler TJ Sent Friday October PM To Tully MIchael Subject TJ Butler on vacation next week Mike I am out of the office next week Could you see to it to get my name off of the list to call if the users have a problem Thank you sir tnx tjb Cell Pager
